title: MEAT LOVERS ONLY CLUB (no filthy veggie peasants allowed)
body:
http://www.seriouseats.com/images/2015/08/20150724-anova-sous-vide-pork-ribs-barbecue-photo-guide-primary-j-kenji-lopez-alt.jpg

^^^ those are some tasty ribs

http://del.h-cdn.co/assets/15/28/980x490/landscape-1436393143-gettyimages-184130285.jpg

https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRJlK3VgxGxRPkxei7jb1tVIUW6-5nrF-hDFrkmHHqrRmL0HSEI

^^^ this masterpiece is called "the Bacon Explosion" which the outer layer of  the meat log is actually a sheet of latticed bacon. perfection.


http://assets.simplyrecipes.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/rosemary-crusted-lamb-shops-horiz-b-1600.jpg

http://cdn2.bigcommerce.com/server2000/df54d/product_images/uploaded_images/tbonesteakongrill.jpg

^^^^ look at that delicious T-bone steak. delicious.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L3IRnFhjKAU

^^^ and now, a song about the love of bacon. Almost brings a tear to my eye. Beautiful.
